message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to the game!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm the one who's going to make the big decisions here!
You're getting a bit too big for your britches, Bob. I'm offering a better deal this time.
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'm not falling for it. This is a fair compromise.
You're not being very cooperative, Bob. I'm taking control of the negotiations.
You're trying to strong-arm me, but I'm not backing down. Let's find a middle ground.
You're not willing to meet me halfway, Bob. I'm taking what's mine.
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my final offer.
You're trying to squeeze the last drop out of me, Alice. But I'm not going down without a fight. This is my last stand.
This is my last chance to get a decent deal. Take it or leave it, Bob.
It's now or never, Alice. I'm taking what I can get. This is my final offer.
